<% import net.parostroj.timetable.model.TrainsCycleType import net.parostroj.timetable.utils.TransformUtil import java.text.Collator import net.parostroj.timetable.model.* import net.parostroj.timetable.actions.* SPACE = " " TRAIN_RIGHT = "⧐" outputId = settings['output.id'] ? diagram.attributes['output.id'] : "" def border() {"border=\"solid .3mm black\""} def padding() {"padding=\".4mm .6mm .1mm 0.6mm\""} def getIntervals(node, filter) { def list = new TimeIntervalList() node.tracks.stream().flatMap({track -> track.timeIntervalList.stream()}) .filter({i -> !i.technological && filter(i)}) .forEach({p -> list.addIntervalByNormalizedStartTime(p)}) return list } def getCycleItems(diagram, node) { def items = [] def intervals = getIntervals(node, {i -> true}) def cTypes = [diagram.engineCycleType, diagram.trainUnitCycleType] cTypes = cTypes + diagram.cycleTypes.findAll {!it.defaultType}; for (interval in intervals) { for (cType in cTypes) { def allItems = interval.train.getCycleItemsForInterval(cType, interval) for (item in allItems) { if (item.fromInterval == interval) { items << item } } } } return items } %> <% generate(nodes) %> <% if (!nodes) { %><% } %> <% def generate(nodes) { def generated = false for (node in nodes) { def loc = util.getLocaleForNode(node, locale) def collator = util.getCollator(loc) def cItems = getCycleItems(diagram, node) if (!cItems) continue %> generated = true ${node.name} <% if (outputId) { %>${outputId}<% } %> <% if (cItems) { %> ${localization["start"].translate(loc)} <% def current = null for (item in cItems) { def same = current == item.train current = item.train def trainName = same ? "" : item.train.name.translate(loc) def cycle = item.cycle def time = same ? "" : diagram.timeConverter.convertIntToText(item.fromInterval.end) def previous = cycle.getPreviousItem(item) previous = previous ? "${previous.train.name.translate(loc)} (${diagram.timeConverter.convertIntToText(previous.toInterval.end)})" : null def desc = cycle.getDisplayDescription() %> ${trainName} ${time} ${cycle.name} ${desc ?: ""} ${getCycleDescription(cycle.type, loc)} ${previous ?: ""} <% } %>
<% } %> <% } %> <% if (!generated) { %><% } %> <% } %> <% def getCycleDescription(type, locale) { return type.name.translate(locale) } %>
